channel.title: Minor aesthetic/cosmetic (non-game mechanic) suggestion for the Cult
channel.description:
Hello friends, A few patches ago, the Cult Leader was overhauled and now chooses a Cult member during the day to sacrifice at the end of the following night. As such, I thought it'd be cool if the selected Cult member, assuming they aren't jailed or otherwise not present in the room that night, would be lying on the bloody table in the Cult hideout, as if they're about to sacrificed. Maybe they're squirming slightly, in fear or anticipation. Can even take it to the next level and have the Cult Leader, if he's there, standing over them with their weapon, or a blade, preparing for the ritual. Just something I was thinking about as I was preparing to sacrifice some poor Seeker yesterday.
Now, I know there's plenty of other cosmetic/aesthetic changes that are in the pipeline (Custom rooms for each class, etc.) but I figured I'd toss this out there for the future.
Thanks for reading.
